long_description: The Racor Pro All-Board Hanger offers an ingenious way to store skateboards, snowboards or wakeboards flat against the wall. 2 articulating, adjustable arms allow simple adjustments to fit any size board. Cushioned sleeves and adjuster knobs won't damage boards. Pro All-Board Hanger is made of sturdy steel with a durable epoxy finish. No assembly required; all hardware is included for easy installation. Hangs one board at a time.
short_description: The Racor Pro All-Board Hanger offers an ingenious way to store skateboards, snowboards or wakeboards flat against the wall.
